How can I revise this sentence to exhibit correlating form in HTML?

The surgeon's responsibility is to:

  • Perform the operation
  • Save the life

To exhibit correlating form in your HTML, you should ensure that all the list items in your unordered list have a consistent grammatical structure. In this case, you can revise the sentence to ensure parallelism by using the gerund form for each list item. Here's the revised version: ```html

The surgeon's responsibilities include:

  • Performing the operation
  • Saving the life
``` By using "Performing" and "Saving," the list items now have a consistent and parallel structure.
